StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetCandidateProfessedExamForPerson]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @PersonID int ) AS
SELECT rowguid AS ID ,[MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID] ,[PROFESSED_EXAM_TYPE] ,[EXAM_DATE] ,[EXAM_ENTERED_DATE] ,[EXAM_SCORE] ,[EXAM_SCORE2] ,[EXAM_SCORE3] FROM [dbo].[CANDIDATE_PROFESSED_EXAM] WHERE [MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID] = @PersonID
